content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was commanded to read the contents of the file "new_file.txt" and it returned the text "This is some text that I am writing to the new file." Then, I was commanded to append more text to the same file and it was successful. The added text was "This is some more text that I am adding to the file." Additionally, I received a message to get hyperlinks from a Wikipedia page, but the command failed due to returning too much output and I was instructed not to execute it again with the same arguments.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "What is the capital of France?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paris", "https://home.adelphi.edu/~ca19535/page%204.html", "https://www.britannica.com/place/France", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_capitals_of_France", "https://www.britannica.com/place/Paris", "https://www.nytimes.com/2013/10/04/t-magazine/marseille-the-secret-capital-of-france.html", "https://www.coe.int/en/web/interculturalcities/paris", "https://www.npr.org/2021/09/25/1039336681/grasse-perfume-france"]', type='action_result')]
"""
